title: No Ordinary Storm (1U130)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time you play a weather condition, exert a [Gandalf] companion or [Gandalf] ally.
Lore:	”'So Gandalf… you try to lead them over Caradhras. And if that fails - where then will you go?'”
Rarity:	U
